name: Froggerty Arcade 2
description:
Guide little froggy across a plethora of exciting landscapes in order to find his home sweet lilli pad home avoiding dangers such as cars, boulders, crocodiles and many more. Don't forget jump on those bonuses and whatever you do......remember the clock is ticking!

FEATURING :

_ Highly addictive pick and and play fun
_ Cute cartoon style 3D graphics
_ Multiple beautifully designed landscapes to hop through
_ Get on the leaderboard and show off to your friends
_ Exclusive soundtrack from Tony Longworth
_ Introducing Frog TV!
_ All major game controllers supported


KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Right hand :
Cursor Keys

Left hand -
W/A/S/D

Pause - ‘Space’ or 'P'

If you enjoy playing Froggerty Arcade 2 then please feel free to drop us a review. We welcome all feedback.
